title: Can we get a new Urgot skin?
body:
i lately have been maining urgot and would love to have a new urgot skin considering he only has one good skin, anyone else think we could get some love?
{{champion:6}}

replies.body: Urgot gets reworked in about 6-9 months and will get a skin to go along with that
Pretty certain that Urgot is on the Champion update list (a few champions down) and due to this he won't get any skins until he is reworked.

Urgot should get a sci-fi skin based on Starcraft's Dragoon or Immortal.

Concepts are similar and they both match Urgot in appearance.

Starcraft's Dragoon
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/starcraft/images/0/01/Dragoon_SC1_Art1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20080710025938

Starcraft's Immortal
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/starcraft/images/2/23/ImmortalColossus_SC2_Art1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140613012017

And they are to contain veteran but crippled Protoss templars so that they could remain in service in Starcraft, a concept very similar to Urgot's general idea. 

Please Riot, make Urgot great again.
